value.halfverse: in the assembly of the upright, in the congregation.
value.verse:
Hallelujah!
I will give thanks to the LORD with my whole heart, *
Great are the deeds of the LORD! *
value.halfverse: they are studied by all who delight in them.

value.verse: His work is full of majesty and splendor, *
value.halfverse: and his righteousness endures for ever.

value.verse: He makes his marvelous works to be remembered; *
value.halfverse: the LORD is gracious and full of compassion.
he is ever mindful of his covenant.
value.verse: He gives food to those who fear him; *
He has shown his people the power of his works *
value.halfverse: in giving them the lands of the nations.

value.verse: The works of his hands are faithfulness and justice; *

value.halfverse: because they are done in truth and equity.
value.verse: They stand fast for ever and ever, *

value.halfverse: holy and awesome is his Name.
value.verse:
He sent redemption to his people;
he commanded his covenant for ever; *

value.halfverse:
those who act accordingly have a good understanding;
 his praise endures for ever.
value.verse: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom; *
